android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_P.description: Marker permission for applications that wish to access notification policy.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.description: Allows the application to tell the system which widgets can be used by which application. With this permission, applications can give access to personal data to other applications. Not for use by common applications.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.description: Allows the application to call phone numbers without your intervention. Malicious applications may cause unexpected calls on your phone bill. Note that this does not allow the application to call emergency numbers.

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.description: Allows application to expand or collapse the status bar.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to control the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can switch networks, turn the phone radio on and off and the like, without ever notifying you.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.REQUEST_DELETE_PACKAG.description: Allows an application to request deleting packages. Apps targeting APIs

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.description: Allows the application to set the system wallpaper.

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.description: Allows the application to set the system wallpaper size hints.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.wxyz.launcher3.email.permission.WRIT.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.wxyz.launcher3.horoscope.permission..description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.wxyz.launcher3.weather.permission.WR.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.wxyz.launcher3.sports.permission.WRI.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.wxyz.launcher3.theme.permission.WRIT.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.wxyz.launcher3.news.permission.WRITE.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.wxyz.launcher3.bible.permission.WRIT.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.READ_LOGS.description: Allows an application to read from the system's various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially including personal or private information.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

protectionLevel: dangerous

manifest_analysis.title: TaskAffinity is set for Activity </br>(com.wxyz.videoplayer.lib.ui.VideosListActivity)
manifest_analysis.desc: If taskAffinity is set, then other application could read the Intents sent to Activities belonging to another task. Always use the default setting keeping the affinity as the package name in order to prevent sensitive information inside sent or received Intents from being read by another application.
manifest_analysis.name: TaskAffinity is set for Activity

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.google.firebase.iid.FirebaseInstanceIdReceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: com.google.android.c2dm.permission.SEND
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

playstore_details.title: News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today
playstore_details.description:
Get breaking news, local & world news today directly on your home screen with News Home! News home is a launcher application powered by your Local & World news providers to keep you informed about your news interests! 



Go beyond news with additional features: the News Home launcher includes themes, games, popular videos, a -1 screen with breaking news, all conveniently added to your home screen for quick access.



You can use News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today to stay up-to-date on daily breaking news, local news headlines and weather news, world news events, trending videos and anything you are interested in. With convenient one swipe access to your favorite news sources it’s a simple and convenient upgrade to your boring stock home screen! 



News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today provides thousands of trusted local and global news sources to personalize your own news feed around your interests. All in one great home screen app & totally FREE. Are we missing your favorite news source? Submit it through our feedback form and we’ll try to add it in for you! 



 

Important Features
Stay Informed - Never Miss Breaking News  

📰 Don’t miss the news on big events like breaking political news, local severe weather or great local events. 

📰 Stay informed on world news, national news, local news, celebrity news, sports news and weather news.  

📰 You’ll always have today’s breaking news, globally and locally delivered directly to your phone.  



Stay Focused – News content tailored to your personal interests  

📰 With thousands of news sources to choose from you can stay up-to-date on just about any topic that you’re interested in! 

📰 Select news from local sports teams to world news topics with News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today’s premium featured news content.  



Videos & Games – Enjoy More Content  

📰 When you want to take an entertainment break from the local news find free instant games included just like your newspaper’s crossword puzzle. 

📰 Checkout hot trending videos or search for a video for all your interests – curated from around the web. 



Trusted Sources – Only the Best Content for Our Readers  

📰 We’ve streamlined the news reading experience to give you content on the topics you care about and put it right on your easy to use Home screen. 



 

📰 You can choose from any of these curated topics or select your own individual sources:  



- Breaking Top News 

- Local News 

- National News 

- World News 

- Business News 

- Technology News  

- Science News  

- Sports News  

- Entertainment News  

- Health News  



 

Explore breaking news, viral videos and enjoy a reading experience fully customized to your interests! Subscribe to every niche interest you have and enjoy personalized news from News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today!  



Download today and stay informed on world news and local news!  



FAQ:  

How do I make my reading experience more personalized?  

News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today has a quick setup screen that will allow you to pick your favorite news sources. The feed comes set to standard sources with the ability to add and drop local news and national news sources.
playstore_details.summary: Best News App for the top Breaking News, Local & World News Today - News Home!
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Best News App for the top Breaking News, Local & World News Today - News Home!
playstore_details.recentChanges:
You can now access local news for any and every locale!
More popular news providers to bring you up to date current events!
New night mode for late night browsing!
Check out the newly added video news section!
Fewer ads and faster loading of news articles!

Fixed a bug where video playback could continue when screen has been turned off.
Other important bugs fixes and stability improvements.
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML:
You can now access local news for any and every locale!
More popular news providers to bring you up to date current events!
New night mode for late night browsing!
Check out the newly added video news section!
Fewer ads and faster loading of news articles!

Fixed a bug where video playback could continue when screen has been turned off.
Other important bugs fixes and stability improvements.
